distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libcdio fixes the following issues:

The following security vulnerabilities were addressed:

- CVE-2017-18199: Fixed a NULL pointer dereference in realloc_symlink in rock.c
  (bsc#1082821)
- CVE-2017-18201: Fixed a double free vulnerability in get_cdtext_generic() in
  _cdio_generic.c (bsc#1082877)
- Fixed several memory leaks (bsc#1082821)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: realloc_symlink in rock.c in GNU libcdio before 1.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL Pointer Dereference) via a crafted iso file.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double free in get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.
notes.title: CVE description
